div.example: { "_id" : ObjectId("56b4f6dfb8c96e5c2e5121c7"), "slug" : "ancnoc", "name" : "anCnoc", "region_slug" : "scotland-highlands", "region" : "Scotland, Highlands", "url" : "http://ancnoc.com/", } { "_id" : ObjectId("56a6a6dab8c96e35ea7b3e24"), "slug" : "suntory", "name" : "Suntory", "region_slug" : "japan", "region" : "Japan", "location" : "Osaka, Japan", "description" : "Suntory Holdings Limited (サントリーホールディングス株式会社 Santorī Hōrudingusu Kabushiki-Gaisha?) is a Japanese brewing and distilling company group.
